name: NATIONAL SPACE SOCIETY
sampleDescriptions:
Incorporating enabling space settlement into the charters of federal agencies involved in civil space activities.  
Creating programs that enable space development and space settlement

We are currently trying to get enabling space settlement added to NASA's charter, the Office of Space Commerce Charter, and the Office of Commercial Space Transportation's charter.  S.584 was influenc
